name: Hexrunner
description:
Having fun with the classical Hexagon game and "I Really Want To Stay At Your House" from Cyberpunk: Edgerunners.  A little side project I did to test Audio Source integration.

Instructions : use the left and right arrow keys to move the player and avoid touching the hexagons.

Music : "I Really Want To Stay At Your House" by Rosa Walton, from the Netflix series Cyberpunk: Edgerunners. All rights reserved.
